02264     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:8] == 4'b1000 && ir[7:6] != 2'b00 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02265         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02266     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_BCHG_BCLR_BSET_immediate } :
02267     // CMPI
02268     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[8] == 1'b0 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02269         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02270     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMPI } :
02271     // MOVE
02272     ( ir[15:14] == 2'b00 && ir[13:12] != 2'b00 && ir[8:6] != 3'b001 &&
02273         (ir[8:6] != 3'b111 || (ir[11:6] == 6'b000_111 || ir[11:6] == 6'b001_111)) &&
02274         (ir[13:12] != 2'b01 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) &&
02275         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02276             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02277     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE } :
02278     // MOVEA
02279     ( ir[15:14] == 2'b00 && (ir[13:12] == 2'b11 || ir[13:12] == 2'b10) && ir[8:6] == 3'b001 &&
02280         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02281             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02282     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEA } :
02283     // NEGX,CLR,NEG,NOT,NBCD
02284     (    ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 && (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001) &&
02285             (    (ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) || 
02286                 (ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11) ||
02287                 (ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_00)
02288             )
02289     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_NEGX_CLR_NEG_NOT_NBCD } :
02290     // MOVE FROM SR
02291     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_0000_11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 && (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001)
02292     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_FROM_SR } :
02293     // CHK
02294     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && ir[8:6] == 3'b110 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02295         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02296             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02297     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CHK } :
02298     // LEA
02299     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && ir[8:6] == 3'b111  && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02300         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02301             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02302     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_LEA } :
02303     // MOVE TO CCR, MOVE TO SR
02304     ( (ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_0100_11 || ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_0110_11) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02305         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02306             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02307     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_TO_CCR_MOVE_TO_SR } :
02308     // SWAP,EXT
02309     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0100 && (ir[11:3] == 9'b1000_01_000 || (ir[11:7] == 5'b1000_1 && ir[5:3] == 3'b000) ) ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_SWAP_EXT } :
02310     // PEA
02311     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1000_01 && ir[5:3] != 3'b000 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02312         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02313             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02314     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_PEA } :
02315     // MOVEM register to memory, predecrement
02316     ( ir[15:7] == 9'b0100_1000_1 && ir[5:3] == 3'b100 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEM_register_to_memory_predecrement } :
02317     // MOVEM register to memory, control
02318     ( ir[15:7] == 9'b0100_1000_1 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02319         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001)
02320     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEM_register_to_memory_control } :
02321     // TST
02322     ( ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_1010 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02323         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02324     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TST } :
02325     // TAS
02326     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1010_11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02327         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02328     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TAS } :
02329     // MOVEM memory to register
02330     ( ir[15:7] == 9'b0100_1100_1 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b011 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02331         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02332             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02333     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEM_memory_to_register } :
02334     // TRAP
02335     ( ir[15:4] == 12'b0100_1110_0100 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TRAP } :
02336     // LINK
02337     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0101_0 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_LINK } :
02338     // UNLK
02339     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0101_1 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ULNK } :
02340     // MOVE USP to USP
02341     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0110_0 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_USP_to_USP } :
02342     // MOVE USP to An
02343     ( ir[15:3] == 13'b0100_1110_0110_1 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVE_USP_to_An } :
02344     // RESET
02345     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0000 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_RESET } :
02346     // NOP
02347     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_NOP } :
02348     // STOP
02349     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0010 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_STOP } :
02350     // RTE,RTR
02351     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0011 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0111 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_RTE_RTR } :
02352     // RTS
02353     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0101 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_RTS } :
02354     // TRAPV
02355     ( ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0110 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_TRAPV } :
02356     // JSR
02357     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1110_10 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02358         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02359             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02360     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_JSR } :
02361     // JMP
02362     ( ir[15:6] == 10'b0100_1110_11 && (ir[5:3] == 3'b010 || ir[5:3] == 3'b101 || ir[5:3] == 3'b110 || ir[5:3] == 3'b111) &&
02363         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02364             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011))
02365     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_JMP } :
02366     // ADDQ,SUBQ not An
02367     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02368         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02369     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADDQ_SUBQ_not_An } :
02370     // ADDQ,SUBQ An
02371     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[7:6] != 2'b00 && ir[5:3] == 3'b001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADDQ_SUBQ_An } :
02372     // Scc
02373     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02374         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02375     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_Scc } :
02376     // DBcc
02377     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] == 3'b001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_DBcc } :
02378     // BSR
02379     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0110 && ir[11:8] == 4'b0001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_BSR } :
02380     // Bcc,BRA
02381     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0110 && ir[11:8] != 4'b0001 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_Bcc_BRA } :
02382     // MOVEQ
02383     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b0111 && ir[8] == 1'b0 ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MOVEQ } :
02384     // CMP
02385     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011) && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010) &&
02386         (ir[8:6] != 3'b000 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) &&
02387         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02388             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02389     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMP } :
02390     // CMPA
02391     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011) && (ir[8:6] == 3'b011 || ir[8:6] == 3'b111) &&
02392         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02393             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02394     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMPA } :
02395     // CMPM
02396     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_CMPM } :
02397     // EOR
02398     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02399         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02400     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_EOR } :
02401     // ADD to mem,SUB to mem,AND to mem,OR to mem
02402     (     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) &&
02403         (ir[8:4] == 5'b10001 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10010 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10011 ||
02404          ir[8:4] == 5'b10101 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10110 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10111 ||
02405          ir[8:4] == 5'b11001 || ir[8:4] == 5'b11010 || ir[8:4] == 5'b11011) &&
02406         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02407     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADD_to_mem_SUB_to_mem_AND_to_mem_OR_to_mem } :
02408     // ADD to Dn,SUB to Dn,AND to Dn,OR to Dn
02409     (     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) &&
02410         (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010) &&
02411         (ir[12] != 1'b1 || ir[8:6] != 3'b000 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) && (ir[12] == 1'b1 || ir[5:3] != 3'b001) &&
02412         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02413             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02414     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADD_to_Dn_SUB_to_Dn_AND_to_Dn_OR_to_Dn } :
02415     // ADDA,SUBA
02416     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) && (ir[8:6] == 3'b011 || ir[8:6] == 3'b111) &&
02417         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02418             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02419     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ADDA_SUBA } :
02420     // ABCD,SBCD,ADDX,SUBX
02421     (     ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) && ir[8:4] == 5'b10000) ||
02422         ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) && (ir[8:4] == 5'b10000 || ir[8:4] == 5'b10100 || ir[8:4] == 5'b11000) ) ) ?
02423         { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ABCD_SBCD_ADDX_SUBX } :
02424     // EXG
02425     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 && (ir[8:3] == 6'b101000 || ir[8:3] == 6'b101001 || ir[8:3] == 6'b110001) ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_EXG } :
02426     // MULS,MULU,DIVS,DIVU
02427     ( (ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1000) && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02428         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 ||
02429             (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_010 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_011 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_100))
02430     ) ? { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU } :
02431     // ASL,LSL,ROL,ROXL,ASR,LSR,ROR,ROXR all memory
02432     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1110 && ir[11] == 1'b0 && ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[5:3] != 3'b000 && ir[5:3] != 3'b001 &&
02433         (ir[5:3] != 3'b111 || (ir[5:0] == 6'b111_000 || ir[5:0] == 6'b111_001))
02434     ) ?  { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR_all_memory } :
02435     // ASL,LSL,ROL,ROXL,ASR,LSR,ROR,ROXR all immediate/register
02436     ( ir[15:12] == 4'b1110 && (ir[7:6] == 2'b00 || ir[7:6] == 2'b01 || ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ) ?
02437         { NO_TRAP, `MICROPC_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR_all_immediate_register } :
02438 
02439     // else
02440 
02441     { ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION_TRAP, UNUSED_MICROPC }
02442 ;
02443 
02444 // load ea
02445 assign load_ea =
02446     (
02447         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL && (ea_mod == 3'b000 || ea_mod == 3'b001 || (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b100))) ||
02448         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER && ea_mod == 3'b000) ||
02449         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN && (ea_mod == 3'b000 || ea_mod == 3'b001)) ||
02450         (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA && (ea_mod == 3'b000 || (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b100)))
02451     ) ? 9'd0 // no ea needed
02452     :
02453     (ea_mod == 3'b010 && (
02454         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02455         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||
02456         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02457     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_An // (An)
02458     :
02459     (ea_mod == 3'b011 && (
02460         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||
02461         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02462     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_An_plus // (An)+
02463     :
02464     (ea_mod == 3'b100 && (
02465         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER ||
02466         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||    ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02467     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_minus_An // -(An)
02468     :
02469     (ea_mod == 3'b101 && (
02470         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02471         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL ||    ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02472     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d16_An // (d16, An)
02473     :
02474     (ea_mod == 3'b110 && (
02475         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02476         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02477     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d8_An_Xn // (d8, An, Xn)
02478     :
02479     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b000 && (
02480         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02481         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL ||    ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02482     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_xxx_W // (xxx).W
02483     :
02484     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b001 && (
02485         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC ||
02486         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02487     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_xxx_L // (xxx).L
02488     :
02489     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b010 && (
02490         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02491     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d16_PC // (d16, PC)
02492     :
02493     (ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b011 && (
02494         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02495     )) ? `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_d8_PC_Xn // (d8, PC, Xn)
02496     :
02497     `MICROPC_LOAD_EA_illegal_command // illegal command
02498 ;
02499 
02500 // perform ea read
02501 assign perform_ea_read =
02502     ( ea_mod == 3'b000 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN ||
02503       ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA) ) ?
02504         `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_Dn :
02505     ( ea_mod == 3'b001 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN) ) ? `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_An :
02506     ( ea_mod == 3'b111 && ea_reg == 3'b100 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA) ) ?
02507         `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_imm :
02508     `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_READ_memory
02509 ;
02510 
02511 // perform ea write
02512 assign perform_ea_write =
02513     ( ea_mod == 3'b000 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN ||
02514       ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA) ) ?
02515         `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_WRITE_Dn :
02516     ( ea_mod == 3'b001 && (ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DN_AN) ) ? `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_WRITE_An :
02517     `MICROPC_PERFORM_EA_WRITE_memory
02518 ;
02519 
02520 // save ea
02521 assign save_ea =
02522     (ea_mod == 3'b011 && (
02523         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROL_POSTINC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER ||
02524         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02525     )) ? `MICROPC_SAVE_EA_An_plus // (An)+
02526     :
02527     (ea_mod == 3'b100 && (
02528         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_ALL || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_CONTROLALTER_PREDEC || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATAALTER ||
02529         ea_type == `EA_TYPE_MEMORYALTER || ea_type == `EA_TYPE_DATA
02530     )) ? `MICROPC_SAVE_EA_minus_An // -(An)
02531     :
02532     9'd0 // no ea needed
02533 ;
02534 
02535 endmodule
02536 
02537 /***********************************************************************************************************************
02538   Condition
02539  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
02540 
02541 
02547 module condition(
02548     input [3:0] cond,
02549     input [7:0] ccr,
02550     output condition
02551 );
02552 
02553 wire C,V,Z,N;
02554 assign C = ccr[0];
02555 assign V = ccr[1];
02556 assign Z = ccr[2];
02557 assign N = ccr[3];
02558 
02559 assign condition =  (cond == 4'b0000) ? 1'b1 :                              // true
02560                     (cond == 4'b0001) ? 1'b0 :                              // false
02561                     (cond == 4'b0010) ? ~C & ~Z    :                        // high
02562                     (cond == 4'b0011) ? C | Z :                             // low or same
02563                     (cond == 4'b0100) ? ~C :                                // carry clear
02564                     (cond == 4'b0101) ? C :                                 // carry set
02565                     (cond == 4'b0110) ? ~Z :                                // not equal
02566                     (cond == 4'b0111) ? Z :                                 // equal
02567                     (cond == 4'b1000) ? ~V :                                // overflow clear
02568                     (cond == 4'b1001) ? V :                                 // overflow set
02569                     (cond == 4'b1010) ? ~N :                                // plus
02570                     (cond == 4'b1011) ? N :                                 // minus
02571                     (cond == 4'b1100) ? (N & V) | (~N & ~V) :               // greater or equal
02572                     (cond == 4'b1101) ? (N & ~V) | (~N & V)    :            // less than
02573                     (cond == 4'b1110) ? (N & V & ~Z) | (~N & ~V & ~Z) :     // greater than
02574                     (cond == 4'b1111) ? (Z) | (N & ~V) | (~N & V) :         // less or equal
02575                     1'b0;
02576 endmodule
02577 
02578 /***********************************************************************************************************************
02579   ALU
02580  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
02581 
02582 
02591 module alu(
02592     input clock,
02593     input reset_n,
02594 
02595     // only zero bit
02596     input [31:0] address,
02597     // only ir[11:9] and ir[6]
02598     input [15:0] ir,
02599     // byte 2'b00, word 2'b01, long 2'b10
02600     input [2:0] size,
02601 
02602     input [31:0] operand1,
02603     input [31:0] operand2,
02604 
02605     input [2:0] interrupt_mask,
02606     input [4:0] alu_control,
02607 
02608     output reg [15:0] sr,
02609     output reg [31:0] result,
02610     
02611     output reg alu_signal,
02612     output alu_mult_div_ready
02613 );
02614 
02615 //****************************************************** Altera-specific multiplication and division modules START
02616 /* Multiplication and division modules.
02617  
02618   Currently this module contains:
02619   - <em>lpm_mult</em> instantiation from Altera Megafunction/LPM library,
02620   - a sequential state machine for division written by Frederic Requin
02621  */
02622 
02623 wire        mult_div_sign = ir[8];
02624 
02625 // 18-2 - division calculation, 1 - waiting for result read, 0 - idle
02626 reg  [4:0]  div_count;
02627 reg [16:0]  quotient;
02628 reg [31:0]  dividend, divider;
02629 
02630 // Compute the difference with borrow
02631 wire [32:0] div_diff = (dividend - divider);
02632 
02633 // Overflow flag: when (quotient >= 65536) or (signed division and (quotient >= 32768 or quotient < -32768))
02634 wire        div_overflow =
02635     (quotient[16] == 1'b1 ||
02636         (mult_div_sign == 1'b1 && (
02637             ((operand1[31] ^ operand2[15]) == 1'b0 && quotient[15] == 1'b1) ||
02638             ((operand1[31] ^ operand2[15]) == 1'b1 && quotient[15:0] > 16'd32768) )));
02639 
02640 wire [15:0] div_quotient = 
02641     // positive quotient
02642     (((operand1[31] ^ operand2[15]) & mult_div_sign) == 1'b0)? quotient[15:0] :
02643     // negative quotient
02644     -quotient[15:0];
02645 
02646 wire [15:0] div_remainder =
02647     // positive remainder
02648     ((operand1[31] & mult_div_sign) == 1'b0)? dividend[15:0] :
02649     // negative remainder
02650     -dividend[15:0];
02651 
02652 always @(posedge clock or negedge reset_n) begin
02653     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
02654         div_count <= 5'd0;
02655     end
02656     // Cycle #0 : load the registers
02657     else if(alu_control == `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU && ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_count == 5'd0) begin
02658         // 17 cycles to finish + wait state
02659         div_count   <= 5'd18;
02660         // Clear the quotient
02661         quotient    <= 17'd0;
02662     
02663         // Unsigned divide or positive numerator
02664         if ((!mult_div_sign) || (!operand1[31]))    dividend <= operand1;
02665         // Negative numerator
02666         else                                        dividend <= -operand1;
02667         
02668         // Unsigned divide or positive denominator
02669         if ((!mult_div_sign) || (!operand2[15]))    divider <= {operand2[15:0],16'd0};
02670         // Negative denominator
02671         else                                        divider <= {-operand2[15:0],16'd0};
02672     end
02673     // Cycles #1-17 : division calculation
02674     else if(div_count > 5'd1) begin
02675         // Check difference's sign
02676         if (!div_diff[32]) begin
02677           // Difference is positive : shift a one
02678           dividend <= div_diff[31:0];
02679           quotient <= {quotient[15:0], 1'b1};
02680         end
02681         else begin
02682           // Difference is negative : shift a zero
02683           quotient <= {quotient[15:0], 1'b0};
02684         end
02685         // Shift right divider
02686         divider <= {1'b0, divider[31:1]};
02687         // Count one bit
02688         div_count <= div_count - 5'd1;
02689     end
02690     // result read
02691     else if(alu_control == `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU && ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_count == 5'd1) begin
02692         // goto idle
02693         div_count <= div_count - 5'd1;
02694     end
02695 end
02696 
02697 
02698 
02699 /*OPTIM
02700 
02701 wire [31:0] divu_quotient;
02702 wire [15:0] divu_remainder;
02703 wire [31:0] divs_quotient;
02704 wire [15:0] divs_remainder;
02705 
02706 // DIVU: 32-bit operand1 unsigned / 16-bit operand2 unsigned = {16-bit remainer unsigned, 16-bit quotient unsigned}
02707 // DIVU: division by 0: trap,   overflow when quotient > 16-bit signed integer, operands not affected
02708 lpm_divide divu_inst(
02709     .clock(clock),
02710     .numer(operand1[31:0]),
02711     .denom(operand2[15:0]),
02712     .quotient(divu_quotient),
02713     .remain(divu_remainder)
02714 );
02715 defparam
02716     divu_inst.lpm_widthn = 32,
02717     divu_inst.lpm_widthd = 16,
02718     divu_inst.lpm_nrepresentation = "UNSIGNED",
02719     divu_inst.lpm_drepresentation = "UNSIGNED",
02720     divu_inst.lpm_hint = "LPM_REMAINDERPOSITIVE=TRUE",
02721     divu_inst.lpm_pipeline = 30;
02722 
02723 // DIVS: 32-bit operand1 signed / 16-bit operand2 signed = {16-bit remainer signed = sign of dividend, 16-bit quotient signed}
02724 // DIVS: division by 0: trap,   overflow when quotient > 16-bit signed integer, operands not affected
02725 lpm_divide divs_inst(
02726     .clock(clock),
02727     .numer(operand1[31:0]),
02728     .denom(operand2[15:0]),
02729     .quotient(divs_quotient),
02730     .remain(divs_remainder)
02731 );
02732 defparam
02733     divs_inst.lpm_widthn = 32,
02734     divs_inst.lpm_widthd = 16,
02735     divs_inst.lpm_nrepresentation = "SIGNED",
02736     divs_inst.lpm_drepresentation = "SIGNED",
02737     divs_inst.lpm_hint = "LPM_REMAINDERPOSITIVE=FALSE",
02738     divs_inst.lpm_pipeline = 30;
02739 */
02740 
02741 // MULS/MULU: 16-bit operand1[15:0] signed/unsigned * operand2[15:0] signed/unsigned = 32-bit result signed/unsigned
02742 // Optimization by Frederic Requin
02743 wire [33:0] mult_result;
02744 
02745 lpm_mult muls(
02746     .clock  (clock),
02747     .dataa  ({operand1[15] & mult_div_sign, operand1[15:0]}),
02748     .datab  ({operand2[15] & mult_div_sign, operand2[15:0]}),
02749     .result (mult_result)
02750 );
02751 defparam
02752     muls.lpm_widtha = 17,
02753     muls.lpm_widthb = 17,
02754     muls.lpm_widthp = 34,
02755     muls.lpm_representation = "SIGNED",
02756     muls.lpm_pipeline = 1;
02757 
02758 /*OPTIM - count LE & MHz in comment in switch
02759 // MULU: 16-bit operand1[15:0] unsigned * 16-bit operand2 unsigned = 32-bit result unsigned
02760 lpm_mult mulu_inst(
02761     .clock(clock),
02762     .dataa(operand1[15:0]),
02763     .datab(operand2[15:0]),
02764     .result(mulu_result)
02765 );
02766 defparam
02767     mulu_inst.lpm_widtha = 16,
02768     mulu_inst.lpm_widthb = 16,
02769     mulu_inst.lpm_widthp = 32,
02770     mulu_inst.lpm_representation = "UNSIGNED",
02771     mulu_inst.lpm_pipeline = 18;
02772 
02773 // MULS: 16-bit operand1[15:0] signed * 16-bit operand2 signed = 32-bit result signed
02774 lpm_mult muls_inst(
02775     .clock(clock),
02776     .dataa(operand1[15:0]),
02777     .datab(operand2[15:0]),
02778     .result(muls_result)
02779 );
02780 defparam
02781     muls_inst.lpm_widtha = 16,
02782     muls_inst.lpm_widthb = 16,
02783     muls_inst.lpm_widthp = 32,
02784     muls_inst.lpm_representation = "SIGNED",
02785     muls_inst.lpm_pipeline = 18;
02786 */
02787 
02788 // multiplication ready in one cycle, division ready when div_count in waiting or idle state
02789 assign alu_mult_div_ready = (div_count == 5'd1 || div_count == 5'd0);
02790 
02791 //****************************************************** Altera-specific multiplication and division modules END
02792 
02793 // ALU internal defines
02794 `define Sm ((size[0] == 1'b1) ? operand2[7] :           (size[1] == 1'b1) ? operand2[15] :            operand2[31])
02795 
02796 `define Dm ((size[0] == 1'b1) ? operand1[7] :           (size[1] == 1'b1) ? operand1[15] :            operand1[31])
02797 
02798 `define Rm ((size[0] == 1'b1) ? result[7] :             (size[1] == 1'b1) ? result[15] :              result[31])
02799 
02800 `define Z  ((size[0] == 1'b1) ? (result[7:0] == 8'b0) : (size[1] == 1'b1) ? (result[15:0] == 16'b0) : (result[31:0] == 32'b0))
02801 
02802 // ALU operations
02803 
02804 reg [2:0] interrupt_mask_copy;
02805 reg was_interrupt;
02806 
02807 always @(posedge clock or negedge reset_n) begin
02808     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
02809         sr <= { 1'b0, 1'b0, 1'b1, 2'b0, 3'b111, 8'b0 };
02810         result <= 32'd0;
02811         alu_signal <= 1'b0;
02812         interrupt_mask_copy <= 3'b0;
02813         was_interrupt <= 1'b0;
02814     end
02815     else begin
02816         case(alu_control)
02817             `ALU_SR_SET_INTERRUPT: begin
02818                 interrupt_mask_copy <= interrupt_mask[2:0];
02819                 was_interrupt <= 1'b1;
02820             end
02821 
02822             `ALU_SR_SET_TRAP: begin
02823                 if(was_interrupt == 1'b1) begin
02824                     sr <= { 1'b0, sr[14], 1'b1, sr[12:11], interrupt_mask_copy[2:0], sr[7:0] };
02825                 end
02826                 else begin
02827                     sr <= { 1'b0, sr[14], 1'b1, sr[12:0] };
02828                 end
02829                 was_interrupt <= 1'b0;
02830             end
02831 
02832             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_1: begin
02833                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[31:24] <= operand1[7:0];
02834                 else                result[15:8] <= operand1[7:0];
02835                 //CCR: no change
02836             end
02837             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_2: begin
02838                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[23:16] <= operand1[7:0];
02839                 else                result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02840                 //CCR: no change
02841             end
02842             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_3: begin
02843                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[15:8] <= operand1[7:0];
02844                 //CCR: no change
02845             end
02846             `ALU_MOVEP_M2R_4: begin
02847                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02848                 //CCR: no change
02849             end
02850             
02851 
02852             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_1: begin
02853                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[7:0] <= operand1[31:24];
02854                 else                result[7:0] <= operand1[15:8];
02855                 // CCR: no change
02856             end
02857             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_2: begin
02858                 if(ir[6] == 1'b1)   result[7:0] <= operand1[23:16];
02859                 else                result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02860                 // CCR: no change
02861             end
02862             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_3: begin
02863                 result[7:0] <= operand1[15:8];
02864                 // CCR: no change
02865             end
02866             `ALU_MOVEP_R2M_4: begin
02867                 result[7:0] <= operand1[7:0];
02868                 // CCR: no change
02869             end
02870 
02871             
02872 
02873             `ALU_SIGN_EXTEND: begin
02874                 // move operand1 with sign-extension to result
02875                 if(size[1] == 1'b1) begin
02876                     result <= { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };
02877                 end
02878                 else begin
02879                     result <= operand1;
02880                 end
02881                 // CCR: no change
02882             end
02883 
02884             `ALU_ARITHMETIC_LOGIC: begin
02885 
02886                 // OR,OR to mem,OR to Dn
02887                 if(         (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b000) ||
02888                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1000)
02889                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] | operand2[31:0];
02890                 // AND,AND to mem,AND to Dn
02891                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b001) ||
02892                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1100)
02893                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] & operand2[31:0];
02894                 // EORI,EOR
02895                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b101) ||
02896                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001)
02897                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] ^ operand2[31:0];
02898                 // ADD,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02899                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02900                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02901                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02902                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
02903                 // SUBI,CMPI,CMPM,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,CMP,SUBQ
02904                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02905                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02906                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001)     ||
02907                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02908                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010)) ||
02909                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02910                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
02911 
02912                 // Z
02913                 sr[2] <= `Z;
02914                 // N
02915                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02916 
02917                 // CMPI,CMPM,CMP
02918                 if( (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02919                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001) ||
02920                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010))
02921                 ) begin
02922                     // C,V
02923                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02924                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02925                     // X not affected
02926                 end
02927                 // ADDI,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02928                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02929                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02930                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02931                 ) begin
02932                     // C,X,V
02933                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
02934                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
02935                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02936                 end
02937                 // SUBI,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,SUBQ
02938                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02939                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02940                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02941                 ) begin
02942                     // C,X,V
02943                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02944                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
02945                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02946                 end
02947                 // ANDI,EORI,ORI,EOR,OR to mem,AND to mem,OR to Dn,AND to Dn
02948                 else begin
02949                     // C,V
02950                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
02951                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
02952                     // X not affected
02953                 end
02954             end
02955 
02956             `ALU_ABCD_SBCD_ADDX_SUBX: begin // 259 LE
02957                 // ABCD
02958                 if( ir[14:12] == 3'b100 ) begin
02959                     result[13:8] = {1'b0, operand1[3:0]} + {1'b0, operand2[3:0]} + {4'b0, sr[4]};
02960                     result[19:14] = {1'b0, operand1[7:4]} + {1'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02961                     
02962                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] + operand2[7:0] + {7'b0, sr[4]};
02963                     
02964                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] > 6'd9) ? (result[13:8] + 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02965                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] > 6'h1F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd2) :
02966                                     (result[13:8] > 6'h0F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd1) :
02967                                     result[19:14];
02968                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02969                     
02970                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02971                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02972                     
02973                     // C
02974                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02975                     // X = C
02976                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02977                     
02978                     // V
02979                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b0 && result[7] == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02980                 end
02981                 // SBCD
02982                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b000 ) begin
02983                 
02984                     result[13:8] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[3:0]} - {2'b0, operand2[3:0]} - {5'b0, sr[4]};
02985                     result[19:14] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[7:4]} - {2'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02986                     
02987                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] - operand2[7:0] - {7'b0, sr[4]};
02988                     
02989                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[13:8] - 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02990                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] < 6'd16) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd2) :
02991                                     (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd1) :
02992                                     result[19:14];
02993                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] < 6'd32 && result[31] == 1'b1) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02994                     
02995                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02996                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02997                 
02998                     // C
02999                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
03000                     // X = C
03001                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
03002                     
03003                     // V
03004                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b1 && result[7] == 1'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
03005                 end
03006                 // ADDX
03007                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0] + sr[4];
03008                 // SUBX
03009                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0] - sr[4];
03010 
03011                 // Z
03012                 sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03013                 // N
03014                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03015 
03016                 // ADDX
03017                 if(ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) begin
03018                     // C,X,V
03019                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
03020                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
03021                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03022                 end
03023                 // SUBX
03024                 else if(ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) begin
03025                     // C,X,V
03026                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03027                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
03028                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03029                 end
03030             end
03031 
03032             `ALU_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR_prepare: begin
03033 
03034                 if(size[0] == 1'b1)         result[7:0] = operand1[7:0];
03035                 else if(size[1] == 1'b1)    result[15:0] = operand1[15:0];
03036                 else if(size[2] == 1'b1)    result[31:0] = operand1[31:0];
03037 
03038                 // X for ASL
03039                 //if(operand2[5:0] > 6'b0 && ir[8] == 1'b1 && ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b00) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b00)) ) begin
03040                     // X set to Dm
03041                 //    sr[4] <= `Dm;
03042                 //end
03043                 // else X not affected
03044 
03045                 // V cleared
03046                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03047                 // C for ROXL,ROXR: set to X
03048                 if( (ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b10) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b10) ) begin
03049                     sr[0] <= sr[4];
03050                 end
03051                 else begin
03052                     // C cleared
03053                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03054                 end
03055 
03056                 // N set
03057                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03058                 // Z set
03059                 sr[2] <= `Z;
03060             end
03061 
03062             `ALU_ASL_LSL_ROL_ROXL_ASR_LSR_ROR_ROXR: begin
03063 
03064                 // ASL
03065                 if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b00) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b00)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
03066                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], 1'b0};
03067 
03068                     sr[1] <= (sr[1] == 1'b0)? (`Rm != `Dm) : 1'b1; // V
03069                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
03070                     sr[4] <= `Dm;           // X
03071                 end
03072                 // LSL
03073                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b01) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b01)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
03074                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], 1'b0};
03075 
03076                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03077                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
03078                     sr[4] <= `Dm;           // X
03079                 end
03080                 // ROL
03081                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b11) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b11)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
03082                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], `Dm};
03083 
03084                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03085                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
03086                                             // X not affected
03087                 end
03088                 // ROXL
03089                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b10) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b10)) && ir[8] == 1'b1) begin
03090                     result[31:0] = {operand1[30:0], sr[4]};
03091 
03092                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03093                     sr[0] <= `Dm;           // C
03094                     sr[4] <= `Dm;           // X
03095                 end
03096                 // ASR
03097                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b00) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b00)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
03098                     if(size[0] == 1'b1)         result[7:0] = { operand1[7], operand1[7:1] };
03099                     else if(size[1] == 1'b1)    result[15:0] = { operand1[15], operand1[15:1] };
03100                     else if(size[2] == 1'b1)    result[31:0] = { operand1[31], operand1[31:1] };
03101 
03102                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03103                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
03104                     sr[4] <= operand1[0];   // X
03105                 end
03106                 // LSR
03107                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b01) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b01)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
03108                     if(size[0] == 1'b1)         result[7:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[7:1] };
03109                     else if(size[1] == 1'b1)    result[15:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[15:1] };
03110                     else if(size[2] == 1'b1)    result[31:0] = { 1'b0, operand1[31:1] };
03111 
03112                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03113                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
03114                     sr[4] <= operand1[0];   // X
03115                 end
03116                 // ROR
03117                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b11) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b11)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
03118                     if(size[0] == 1'b1)         result[7:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[7:1] };
03119                     else if(size[1] == 1'b1)    result[15:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[15:1] };
03120                     else if(size[2] == 1'b1)    result[31:0] = { operand1[0], operand1[31:1] };
03121 
03122                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03123                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
03124                     // X not affected
03125                 end
03126                 // ROXR
03127                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b10) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b10)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
03128                     if(size[0] == 1'b1)         result[7:0] = {sr[4], operand1[7:1]};
03129                     else if(size[1] == 1'b1)    result[15:0] = {sr[4], operand1[15:1]};
03130                     else if(size[2] == 1'b1)    result[31:0] = {sr[4], operand1[31:1]};
03131 
03132                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03133                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
03134                     sr[4] <= operand1[0];   // X
03135                 end
03136 
03137                 // N set
03138                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03139                 // Z set
03140                 sr[2] <= `Z;
03141             end
03142 
03143             `ALU_MOVE: begin
03144                 result = operand1;
03145 
03146                 // X not affected
03147                 // C cleared
03148                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03149                 // V cleared
03150                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03151 
03152                 // N set
03153                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03154                 // Z set
03155                 sr[2] <= `Z;
03156             end
03157 
03158             `ALU_ADDA_SUBA_CMPA_ADDQ_SUBQ: begin
03159                 // ADDA: 1101
03160                 // CMPA: 1011
03161                 // SUBA: 1001
03162                 // ADDQ,SUBQ: 0101 xxx0,1
03163                 // operation requires that operand2 was sign extended
03164                 
03165                 // ADDA,ADDQ
03166                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0) )
03167                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03168                 // SUBA,CMPA,SUBQ
03169                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1) )
03170                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03171                 
03172                 // for CMPA
03173                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 ) begin
03174                     // Z
03175                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03176                     // N
03177                     sr[3] <= `Rm;
03178 
03179                     // C,V
03180                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03181                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03182                     // X not affected
03183                 end
03184                 // for ADDA,SUBA,ADDQ,SUBQ: ccr not affected
03185             end
03186 
03187             `ALU_CHK: begin
03188                 result[15:0] = operand1[15:0] - operand2[15:0];
03189                 
03190                 // undocumented behavior: Z flag, see 68knotes.txt
03191                 //sr[2] <= (operand1[15:0] == 16'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
03192                 // undocumented behavior: C,V flags, see 68knotes.txt
03193                 //sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03194                 //sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03195                 
03196                 // C,X,V
03197                 //    sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03198                 //    sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
03199                 //    sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03200                 // +: 0-1,    0-0=0, 1-1=0
03201                 // -: 0-0=1,  1-0,   1-1=1
03202                 // operand1 - operand2 > 0
03203                 if( operand1[15:0] != operand2[15:0] && ((~`Dm & `Sm) | (~`Dm & ~`Sm & ~`Rm) | (`Dm & `Sm & ~`Rm)) == 1'b1 ) begin
03204                     // clear N
03205                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03206                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03207                 end
03208                 // operand1 < 0
03209                 else if( operand1[15] == 1'b1 ) begin
03210                     // set N
03211                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03212                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03213                 end
03214                 // no trap
03215                 else begin
03216                     // N undefined: not affected
03217                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03218                 end
03219 
03220                 // X not affected
03221             end
03222 
03223             `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU: begin
03224 
03225                 // division by 0
03226                 if(ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && operand2[15:0] == 16'b0) begin
03227                     // X not affected
03228                     // C cleared
03229                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03230                     // V,Z,N undefined: cleared
03231                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03232                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03233                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03234 
03235                     // set trap
03236                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03237                 end
03238                 // division in idle state
03239                 else if(ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_count == 5'd0) begin
03240                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03241                 end
03242                 // division overflow: divu, divs
03243                 else if(ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_overflow == 1'b1) begin
03244                 /*OPTIM
03245                 else if( ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && mult_div_sign == 1'b0) && (divu_quotient[31:16] != 16'd0)) ||
03246                          ((ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && mult_div_sign == 1'b1) && (divs_quotient[31:16] != {16{divs_quotient[15]}}))
03247                 ) begin
03248                 */
03249                     // X not affected
03250                     // C cleared
03251                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03252                     // V set
03253                     sr[1] <= 1'b1;
03254                     // Z,N undefined: cleared and set
03255                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03256                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03257 
03258                     // set trap
03259                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03260                 end
03261                 // division
03262                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 ) begin
03263                     result[31:0] <= {div_remainder, div_quotient};
03264                     
03265                     // X not affected
03266                     // C cleared
03267                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03268                     // V cleared
03269                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03270                     // Z
03271                     sr[2] <= (div_quotient == 16'b0);
03272                     // N
03273                     sr[3] <= (div_quotient[15] == 1'b1);
03274 
03275                     // set trap
03276                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03277                 end
03278                 // multiplication
03279                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 ) begin
03280                     result[31:0] <= mult_result[31:0];
03281 
03282                     // X not affected
03283                     // C cleared
03284                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03285                     // V cleared
03286                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03287                     // Z
03288                     sr[2] <= (mult_result[31:0] == 32'b0);
03289                     // N
03290                     sr[3] <= (mult_result[31] == 1'b1);
03291 
03292                     // set trap
03293                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03294                 end
03295             end
03296 
03297 
03298             `ALU_BCHG_BCLR_BSET_BTST: begin // 97 LE
03299                 // byte
03300                 if( ir[5:3] != 3'b000 ) begin
03301                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]);
03302                     result = operand1;
03303                     result[ operand2[2:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03304                 end
03305                 // long
03306                 else if( ir[5:3] == 3'b000 ) begin
03307                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]);
03308                     result = operand1;
03309                     result[ operand2[4:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03310                 end
03311 
03312                 // C,V,N,X not affected
03313             end
03314 
03315             `ALU_TAS: begin
03316                 result[7:0] <= { 1'b1, operand1[6:0] };
03317 
03318                 // X not affected
03319                 // C cleared
03320                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03321                 // V cleared
03322                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03323 
03324                 // N set
03325                 sr[3] <= (operand1[7] == 1'b1);
03326                 // Z set
03327                 sr[2] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'b0);
03328             end
03329 
03330 
03331             `ALU_NEGX_CLR_NEG_NOT_NBCD_SWAP_EXT: begin
03332                 // NEGX / CLR / NEG / NOT
03333                 if ((ir[11:8] == 4'b0000) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0010) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0100) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0110))
03334                     result = 32'b0 - (operand1[31:0] & {32{ir[10] | ~ir[9]}}) - ((sr[4] & ~ir[10] & ~ir[9]) | (ir[10] & ir[9]));
03335                 /*OPTIM
03336                 // NEGX
03337                 if(    ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 ) result = 32'b0 - operand1[31:0] - sr[4];
03338                 // CLR
03339                 else if (ir[11:8] == 4'b0010) result = 32'b0;
03340                 // NEG
03341                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 ) result = 32'b0 - operand1[31:0];
03342                 // NOT
03343                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 ) result = ~operand1[31:0];
03344                 */
03345                 // NBCD
03346                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_00 ) begin
03347                     
03348                     result[3:0] = 5'd25 - operand1[3:0];
03349                     result[7:4] = (operand1[3:0] > 4'd9) ? (5'd24 - operand1[7:4]) : (5'd25 - operand1[7:4]);
03350                     
03351                     if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && result[3:0] == 4'd9 && result[7:4] == 4'd9) begin
03352                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03353                         result[7:4] = 4'd0;
03354                     end
03355                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && (result[3:0] == 4'd9 || result[3:0] == 4'd15)) begin
03356                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03357                         result[7:4] = result[7:4] + 4'd1;
03358                     end
03359                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0) begin
03360                         result[3:0] = result[3:0] + 4'd1;
03361                     end
03362                     
03363                     //V undefined: unchanged
03364                     //Z
03365                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03366                     //C,X
03367                     sr[0] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03368                     sr[4] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1; //=C
03369                 end
03370                 // SWAP
03371                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 ) result = { operand1[15:0], operand1[31:16] };
03372                 // EXT byte to word
03373                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_10 ) result = { result[31:16], {8{operand1[7]}}, operand1[7:0] };
03374                 // EXT word to long
03375                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_11 ) result = { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };
03376 
03377                 // N set if negative else clear
03378                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03379 
03380                 // CLR,NOT,SWAP,EXT
03381                 if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 || ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 || ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 || ir[11:7] == 5'b1000_1 ) begin
03382                     // X not affected
03383                     // C,V cleared
03384                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03385                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03386                     // Z set
03387                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03388                 end
03389                 // NEGX
03390                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 ) begin
03391                     // C set if borrow
03392                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03393                     // X=C
03394                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03395                     // V set if overflow
03396                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03397                     // Z cleared if nonzero else unchanged
03398                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03399                 end
03400                 // NEG
03401                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 ) begin
03402                     // C clear if zero else set
03403                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03404                     // X=C
03405                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03406                     // V set if overflow
03407                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03408                     // Z set if zero else clear
03409                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03410                 end
03411             end
03412 
03413 
03414             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_ADD: begin
03415                 result <= operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03416 
03417                 // CCR not affected
03418             end
03419 
03420             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_SUB: begin
03421                 result <= operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03422 
03423                 // CCR not affected
03424             end
03425 
03426             `ALU_MOVE_TO_CCR_SR_RTE_RTR_STOP_LOGIC_TO_CCR_SR: begin
03427 
03428                 // MOVE TO SR,RTE,STOP,ORI to SR,ANDI to SR,EORI to SR
03429                 if( ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0110 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0011 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0010 ||
03430                     ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_01_111100
03431                 )         sr <= { operand1[15], 1'b0, operand1[13], 2'b0, operand1[10:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03432                 // MOVE TO CCR,RTR,ORI to CCR,ANDI to CCR,EORI to CCR
03433                 else if(     ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0111 ||
03434                             ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_00_111100
03435                 )        sr <= { sr[15:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03436             end
03437 
03438             `ALU_SIMPLE_MOVE: begin
03439                 result <= operand1;
03440                 
03441                 // CCR not affected
03442             end
03443             
03444             `ALU_LINK_MOVE: begin
03445                 if(ir[3:0] == 3'b111) begin
03446                     result <= operand1 - 32'd4;
03447                 end
03448                 else begin
03449                     result <= operand1;
03450                 end
03451                 
03452                 // CCR not affected
03453             end
03454 
03455         endcase
03456     end
03457 end
03458 
03459 endmodule
03460 
03461 /***********************************************************************************************************************
03462   Microcode branch
03463  ***********************************************************************************************************************/
03464 
03465 
03474 module microcode_branch(
03475     input clock,
03476     input reset_n,
03477 
03478     input [4:0]     movem_loop,
03479     input [15:0]    movem_reg,
03480     input [31:0]    operand2,
03481     input           alu_signal,
03482     input           alu_mult_div_ready,
03483     input           condition,
03484     input [31:0]    result,
03485     input           overflow,
03486     input           stop_flag,
03487     input [15:0]    ir,
03488     input [7:0]     decoder_trap,
03489     input           trace_flag,
03490     input           group_0_flag,
03491     input [2:0]     interrupt_mask,
03492 
03493     input [8:0]     load_ea,
03494     input [8:0]     perform_ea_read,
03495     input [8:0]     perform_ea_write,
03496     input [8:0]     save_ea,
03497     input [8:0]     decoder_micropc,
03498 
03499     input           prefetch_ir_valid_32,
03500     input           prefetch_ir_valid,
03501     input           jmp_address_trap,
03502     input           jmp_bus_trap,
03503     input           finished,
03504 
03505     input [3:0]     branch_control,
03506     input [3:0]     branch_offset,
03507     output [8:0]    micro_pc
03508 );
03509 
03510 reg [8:0] micro_pc_0 = 9'd0;
03511 reg [8:0] micro_pc_1;
03512 reg [8:0] micro_pc_2;
03513 reg [8:0] micro_pc_3;
03514 
03515 assign micro_pc =
03516     (reset_n == 1'b0) ? 9'd0 :
03517     (jmp_address_trap == 1'b1 || jmp_bus_trap == 1'b1) ? `MICROPC_ADDRESS_BUS_TRAP :
03518     (   (branch_control == `BRANCH_movem_loop               && movem_loop == 5'b10000) ||
03519         (branch_control == `BRANCH_movem_reg                && movem_reg[0] == 0) ||
03520         (branch_control == `BRANCH_operand2                 && operand2[5:0] == 6'b0) ||
03521         (branch_control == `BRANCH_alu_signal               && alu_signal == 1'b0) ||
03522         (branch_control == `BRANCH_alu_mult_div_ready       && alu_mult_div_ready == 1'b1) ||
03523         (branch_control == `BRANCH_condition_0              && condition == 1'b0) ||
03524         (branch_control == `BRANCH_condition_1              && condition == 1'b1) ||
03525         (branch_control == `BRANCH_result                   && result[15:0] == 16'hFFFF) ||
03526         (branch_control == `BRANCH_V                        && overflow == 1'b0) ||
03527         (branch_control == `BRANCH_movep_16                 && ir[6] == 1'b0) ||
03528         (branch_control == `BRANCH_stop_flag_wait_ir_decode && stop_flag == 1'b1) ||
